Package uk.ac.cam.mgm52.cnn

Class Tensor

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.cam.mgm52.cnn.Tensor
public class Tensor
extends java.lang.Object
Stores an N-dimensional tensor. Facilitates operations including cross-correlation mapping and extracting subsets.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Tensor​(int... dimSizes)
    Creates new tensor with given dimensions.
    Tensor​(int[] dimSizes, double[] values)
    Creates new tensor with given dimensions, values.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Tensor crossCorrelationMap​(Tensor filter)
    Generate cross-correlation map of a filter applied to this tensor.
    double get​(int... coords)
    Get a value at a coordinate
    Tensor getRegion​(int[] corner1, int[] corner2)
    Returns tensor with opposite corners at corner1 and corner2
    double[] getValuesCopy()
    Return copy of Tensor values array.
    double innerProduct​(Tensor t)
    Multiply each element of t1 with a corresponding element of t2, then sum these values.
    Tensor randoms​(float min, float max)
    Return new tensor with same dimensions, but values randomized within range.
    java.lang.String toString()
    Return string displaying all tensor values (as a sequence of matrices).
    Tensor zeroes()
    Return new tensor with same dimensions, but values at zero.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Tensor

      public Tensor​(int... dimSizes)
      Creates new tensor with given dimensions. Default values are zero.
      Parameters:
      dimSizes - the size (length) of each diminsion within the tensor

    • Tensor

      public Tensor​(int[] dimSizes, double[] values)
      Creates new tensor with given dimensions, values.
      Parameters:
      dimSizes - the size (length) of each diminsion within the tensor
      values - all values to be used by the tensor, given using horner's scheme

  • Method Details

    • getValuesCopy

      public double[] getValuesCopy()
      Return copy of Tensor values array. This should not be used at all frequently: copying all values is costly.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Return string displaying all tensor values (as a sequence of matrices). Each matrix represents an XY plane within tensor. Starts with lowest z, w, etc values.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object

    • zeroes

      public Tensor zeroes()
      Return new tensor with same dimensions, but values at zero.

    • randoms

      public Tensor randoms​(float min, float max)
      Return new tensor with same dimensions, but values randomized within range.
      Parameters:
      min - min value of each item
      max - max value of each item

    • get

      public double get​(int... coords)
      Get a value at a coordinate

    • getRegion

      public Tensor getRegion​(int[] corner1, int[] corner2)
      Returns tensor with opposite corners at corner1 and corner2
      Parameters:
      corner1 - First corner of region. A list of integer coordinates.
      corner2 - Second corner of region. A list of integer coordinates.

    • innerProduct

      public double innerProduct​(Tensor t)
      Multiply each element of t1 with a corresponding element of t2, then sum these values.

    • crossCorrelationMap

      public Tensor crossCorrelationMap​(Tensor filter)
      Generate cross-correlation map of a filter applied to this tensor.
